sub_title: Creative and Project Manager in Art Tech
summary: As a graduate of Cultural Anthropology and Development Sociology at the Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam, I have delved into diverse working environments. Exploring as a creative entrepreneur has brought me to create artistry programs, manage projects, curate content and perform under themes of Artist Empowerment, AI-generating and theatrical mis en scène. Simultaneously working with The Platform, Creative Fabrica and Logics Locks further brought me to collaborate with locations such as Skatepark NOORD, Kanaal40 and GastArt Gallery.

education.degree_name: RASL Minor Re-imagining tomorrow through Arts and Science
Bachelor Cultural Anthropology and Development Sociology

school.name: Royal Academy of Art, The Hague | Koninklijke Academie van Beeldende Kunsten (KABK)

profile_positions.description:
The Amsterdam-based collective operates at the roots of the city’s underground, bringing the most progressive creatives from across the board to celebrate their talent. Whether a series of art exhibitions, panel talks, performances or skate competitions, the goal is always to amplify the voices around them.

Working alongside the Platform Founders, I have been involved in the production of events through the selection of tattoo artists, organization of logistics prior to, and during each event, as well as ensuring the oversight of activity. I joined the team prior to The Platform’s third edition at Skatepark NOORD which had an attendance of 780 guests. We are currently in residence with Kanaal40, having had two successful editions at full capacity with around 350 guests. The sales within the tattoo division have doubled from each previous event, growing at the rate of 200%.

Managing the Tattoo Division through its polarities; creative curating on one hand and licensing & safety on the other, has further motivated me to take advantage of this knowledge. I founded the Platform Basement in September 2022, a private studio space with the goal of allowing invited artists to create and collaborate. This studio is a space of exploration under which I coordinated an Artist in Residence program in collaboration with GastArt. Furthermore, tattoo artists traveling from abroad to participate in the platform’s event have the possibility of tattooing in the studio; taking full advantage of exposure from the event and/or tapping into their customer base in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Art Director and Project Manager of The Platform’s Tattoo Division

profile_positions.description:
My position at Creative Fabrica enables me to work alongside the development of AI image generator, CF Spark. I started working with CF Spark in its infant phase by testing the first features of the product. Through creating and curating content with CF Spark with more than 3770 images, I aided developers in understanding its patterns and areas of improvement. I tested its limits through each phase of development to determine which tools need more attention. 

Training CF Spark to produce realistic and coherent images through diverse categories (sculptures, clip art, photography etc…) further resulted in the creation of Promptomania; a public prompt builder with the goal of facilitating users in achieving satisfactory images. I therefore tested categories such as; art mediums, materials, colors, descriptive adjectives, dimensionality, geometry, lighting, artists’ techniques and stylistic trends, to determine which words or word combinations CF Spark deciphers best. The successful wordings are currently available to use in Promptonia’s PromptBuilder.
profile_positions.title: Content Curator

profile_positions.description:
Exclusively tattooing original and hand-drawn designs through the technique of Hand poking. I have grown to build a private studio for my practice; which in parallel has hosted 5 guest artists over the last four months. By developing a business around this creative outlet, I have been my own social media content creator and manager since 2021. My bachelor thesis was furthermore a result of my exploration into the themes of digitalization; by conducting an ethnographic research on the influence of Instagram on the tattoo industry. 

Within my practice, I channel creativity through experimentation. Whether through unconventional stencil techniques, intricate color choices or diversifying design inspiration; I chose to question the boundaries of this medium. I am currently experimenting with AI image generators to create a basis for my designs.
profile_positions.title: Tattoo Artist

profile_positions.description: Through the intersection of performance, safety and management, Game Masters create a theatrical performance; transforming a puzzle solving escape game into a Horror experience. The attention to scenic design, production and storytelling at The Catacombs has led us to receive 9 different awards.
profile_positions.title: Game Master

profile_positions.description: Acting as a bridge between the local environment and the artist themselves, my main focus is to aid foreign artists in the understanding of local materials, production advantages and limitations. Curating the selection of residents and furthermore assisting with production permits working alongside the process of creation.
profile_positions.title: Artist in Resident Program: Coordinator

profile_positions.location: New York, New York, United States
profile_positions.description: Interviewing & Writing on behalf of artists is the main focus while working with Artifact.  I conduct artist selection to further create their profiles on the Artifact website; showcasing their artworks, intentions, histories and motivations.
profile_positions.title: Artist Liaison
